content.rendered:
We are thrilled to be offering one of the most exciting new technologies in facial rejuvenation – FaceTite – a minimally invasive and non-surgical mini faceliftand neck lift. The FaceTite system delivers radio-frequency energy under the skin to permanently destroy fat cells and tighten the skin of the lower face and neck.

Traditionally, the treatment options for the aging midface and lower face have been limited to surgical correction with a facelift or a neck lift. Over the past 2 decades, the number of surgical facelifts performed annually has declined. The ever-increasing popularity of neuromodulators (Botox/Dysport) and soft tissue fillers may account for some of the decline in surgical cases; but other important reasons for this decline is that patients do not have time for post-surgical recovery, they are scared of surgery or they cannot afford surgery. Furthermore, some patients are seeing the earliest signs of facial aging and they want to correct them before they get worse, but they are not appropriate facelift candidates. FaceTite gives us the ability to deliver surgical results to patients who are not ready for a face- or neck-lift, either physically, chronologically or emotionally.

FaceTite offers dramatic facial contouring without surgery and with as little as 2 to 5 days of downtime. It is the perfect solution for patients who are concerned about excess neck fat, skin laxity, and the early appearance of the marionette lines, jowls or loss of definition at the mandibular border. FaceTite is also ideal for patients who have had surgery, but require a tuck up “tune-up” procedure.

Feel free to contact us at any time and schedule a consultation for your FaceTite treatment today!
